definitions.definition: The current moment or period of time.

main_definition: The current moment or period of time.

definitions.definition: A gift , especially one given for birthdays, Christmas, anniversaries, graduations, weddings, or any other special occasions.
examples: Oh! Thank you for the presents ! How considerate of you!
Only his friends attended his birthday party. They're all broke , so he got no present .

definitions.definition: The position of a soldier in presenting arms .
examples: He was at present near the headquarters gates.
I think our toddler's just left us a little present in his diaper...
She has to deal with her cats' presents in the litterboxes on a daily basis, and she doesn't mind one bit .

main_definition: A gift , especially one given for birthdays, Christmas, anniversaries, graduations, weddings, or any other special occasions.
secondary_definitions: ( military ) The position of a soldier in presenting arms .
